title: Meadowlands Arena
summary: Meadowlands Arena[4] (formerly Brendan Byrne Arena, Continental Airlines Arena and Izod Center) is an inactive indoor arena located in the Meadowlands Sports Complex in East Rutherford, New Jersey, United States. The arena is located on New Jersey Route 120 across the highway from MetLife Stadium and the Meadowlands Racetrack, next to the American Dream shopping and entertainment complex.
